body: This black silk eye patch is adorned by a skull and crossbones worked in silver thread. The wearer of this patch gains a +2 competence bonus on Swim and Climb checks. In addition, once per day, the wearer of this eye patch can gain the effects of either touch of the sea or expeditious retreat on command (wearer's choice).
name: Pirate's Eye Patch
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Wondrous Items/Eyes/Eyes Slot Wondrous Items/Pirates Eye Patch
